name: Vineet Kushwaha
aboutme1:
I'm a { full-stack web developer } with a strong grip on React, Node.js, and everything in between. I like building responsive, real-world applications that are easy to use and fun to make.
Alongside web dev, I use Python for automating tasks, experimenting with ideas, and working on computer vision projects. I'm also studying Data Science, which adds some extra perspective to how I solve problems and think about code. I’m still learning, but I try to build with intention and keep getting better with every project.

list.title: Endxiety
list.description: AI-powered mental wellness app with anonymous chat, emotion tracking, and journaling.

list.title: Saarthi AI
list.description: Multilingual scheme recommender using AI, accessible via voice and text.

list.title: BiblioVerse
list.description: AI-based ebook recommender system with big data filtering and a modern UI.

list.title: Real-Time Hand Gesture MIDI Synthesizer
list.description: Gesture-based MIDI controller built using OpenCV + MediaPipe for real-time music output.

list.title: Bengaluru AI Road Guardian
list.description: Smart city pothole reporter with AI-based image classification and emergency dashboards.
